title: Top 30 NEW Xbox Series X & Xbox One Games of 2022 [4K]

title: Ghostwire: Tokyo - Before You Buy
description:
Ghostwire: Tokyo (PC, PS5) is Tango Gamework's new action-focused horror FPS adventure. How is it? Let's talk.
Subscribe for more: https://www.youtube.com/gameranxTV?sub_confirmation=1
